title: Lunar Revel Shop and Skin Discounts
body:
Hey everyone, just wanted to ask when will the Lunar Revel Shop open? On the page it says Jan 28 till Feb 8. No shop for me yet. 

Oh and one more question, don't 1350 sinks usually go on sale? If so how come the Caitlin skin didnt go on sale, plus it's the first time launching it unlike the riven skin that has a discount at launch but now it's 1350.

replies.body:
Hey dudes,

The website is wrong, it will be enabled tomorrow (January 29) with a rolling start so it _should_ be in the AM but it could be later.

We're working on getting the site updated.
Ah okay^^ thank you for the info~
Okay. Thank you for letting us know. I know you are all VERY busy today. Thanks for the info!

Still no Lunar Revel Shop. What is the deal, Riot? Saw another post about this but now I can't find it. According to the patch notes, it should be  available. Some kind of acknowledgement or update from Riot would be nice on this one.
I checked the Lunar Revel page again, the date for it said "Janurary 28 to Feb 8 *18:59 AEDT* possibly the store might come out on that time?

Ah, you are thinking it might not START until 18:59 AEDT today as well (to match the published end time). That is a good guess. That is the only idea that seems to make sense so far. Fingers crossed. Riot could definitely be more clear about this. Does memory serve me correctly in thinking that the Snowdown Shop did the same thing?
Nope, no store yet .._.. And yeah same thing happened to showdown shop, but instead there was a big that caused them to delay the opening of the shop, but riot made an official post about that.

there has been a change to the way discounts apply to skins, they have launched early sales discount. Skins no longer are discounted on release it's now further down the track when they receive a discount. As for lunar revel shop im guessing its on na time not oce???
Ah okay, well it'd be best to wait I guess and I'm not sure, I checked the dates on the oce lunar revel page.
